# KnownPatterns.DefaultPattern field

Returns an array of strings that contains default pattern. Always returns {FullDate} {Level} - {Message}{NewLine}

```csharp
public static readonly string[] DefaultPattern;
```

## Property Value

Array of string that contains pattern to use.
